name: Monk and Artificer (Playbooks for 6e)
description:
Here are two playbooks for Jared Sinclair's 6E, to add to your campaign world.

The Monk focuses on quick hand-to-hand melee combat. The faster you strike, the easier your enemies hit the ground. 

The Artificer uses a hand-held magical device to create elixirs & constructs to boost themselves and their allies. Although the art of Artifice is not cheap, balance your money wisely as you seek to improve your creations.

I hope you enjoy adding these to your campaign world!
